description: Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `getCustomer()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
Bridges: Method `updateCustomer()` must have `public function update<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionRequestTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer` signature.
Prefix `is` must not be used with postfix `Exist`. Method: Spryker\Zed\CompanyUser\Persistence\CompanyUserRepository::isActiveCompanyUserExists().
